meanings.definition: To have learned too much or excessively.
meanings.sent1: She overlearnt all the information for the test and felt overwhelmed.
meanings.sent2: He overlearnt the new software quickly and impressed his boss.
meanings.sent3: The student overlearnt the math formulas and started solving problems in his sleep!
meanings.sent4: Her brain overlearnt the material like a sponge soaking up water.
meanings.sent5: The idea of overlearning can be helpful for mastering a skill.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she overlearnt the lyrics to her favorite song.
meanings.sent2: He overlearnt the dance routine and performed it perfectly at the recital.
meanings.sent3: The chef overlearnt the recipe and accidentally added too much salt.
meanings.sent4: His mind overlearnt the lesson like a computer saving data.
meanings.sent5: Overlearning can sometimes lead to forgetting other important information.
